chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G has the above problem:

Yesterday morning, my phone's battery was at 100%, and when I tried to turn it on again in the afternoon, it turned off, showing 0%. I didn't do anything unusual that could have caused the battery to drain faster. Normally, it lasts for 1-2 days. When I tried to charge it then, it only charged up to 4% before turning hot. I powered everything off and let it cool down overnight. The next day, when I turned it on again, the battery dropped another 10% within a few minutes, and it started getting hot again. I put it away and haven't used it since then.

Today morning, I've reset everything back to factory settings and would like to return it now. I purchased this phone from you in October 2023.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for the 29.05.2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 05.06.2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Sila from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
